Key Match Events: Bebe scored a brilliant free-kick from around 40 yards
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bebe currently plays for Real Zaragoza in the Spanish second-tier, on loan from Rayo Vallecano
Others: Cape Verde won the game 3-0, as Ryan Mendes and Kevin Pina also found the net
Cape Verde is currently top of Group B in AFCON after winning their opening two games against Ghana and Mozambique
